articles.title: Transcripts: Suspected Brown University, Brookline shooter confessed in videos, DOJ says
articles.description:
“I am not going to apologize, because during my lifetime no one sincerely apologized to me,” Claudio Neves Valente said in Portuguese, according to translated transcripts released by the FBI.

The post Transcripts: Suspected Brown University, Brookline shooter confessed in videos, DOJ says appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: State Rep. Chynah Tyler to pay $6K after spending campaign funds on personal uses, including takeout, salon visit
articles.description:
